alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 2:36AM EST until December 20 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Vermont...New Hampshire... Connecticut River Near Dalton affecting Caledonia, Grafton, Coos and Essex Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River near Dalton. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 AM EST Wednesday was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 13.5 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
